mega_guides.title: How to Cite in MLA 9: Complete MLA 9th Edition Citation Guide
mega_guides.description: Master MLA 9th edition citation format with comprehensive examples and guidelines for works cited and in-text citations

mega_guides.title: How to Create an MLA 9 Works Cited Page: Format Guide
mega_guides.description: Complete guide to formatting MLA 9 works cited pages with organization, hanging indents, and proper citation order

mega_guides.title: How to Do MLA 9 In-Text Citations: Complete Guide
mega_guides.description: Master MLA 9 in-text citation rules including parenthetical citations, narrative citations, and page number placement

mega_guides.title: How to Check MLA 9 Citations: Validation Guide
mega_guides.description: Learn how to validate MLA 9 citations and catch formatting errors in works cited and in-text citations

mega_guides.title: How to Fix MLA 9 Citation Errors: Common Mistakes Guide
mega_guides.description: Identify and fix common MLA 9 citation mistakes in works cited pages and in-text citations

mega_guides.title: MLA 9 Citation Guide for English Majors
mega_guides.description: Essential MLA 9 citation guide for English literature research and literary analysis papers

mega_guides.title: MLA 9 Citation Guide for Literature Studies
mega_guides.description: Complete MLA 9 citation guide for literature research including novels, poems, plays, and critical theory

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite a Book in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing books in MLA 9 including single and multiple authors, editions, and publishers

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite a Book Chapter in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing book chapters in MLA 9 including edited books and anthologies

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite a Journal Article in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing journal articles in MLA 9 including volume, issue, page ranges, and DOIs

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite a Website in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing websites in MLA 9 including webpages, online articles, and web-only sources

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite a YouTube Video in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing YouTube videos in MLA 9 including uploader names, timestamps, and video descriptions

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite a Newspaper Article in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing newspaper articles in MLA 9 including online and print newspapers

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite a Film or Movie in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing films and movies in MLA 9 including director, performers, and streaming platforms

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite a Poem in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing poems in MLA 9 including anthologies, collections, and line numbers

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite a Short Story in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing short stories in MLA 9 including anthologies, collections, and page numbers

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite a Play in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing plays in MLA 9 including act, scene, line numbers and performance citations

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite a Dictionary Entry in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing dictionary entries in MLA 9 including online and print dictionaries

source_type_guides.title: How to Cite an Interview in MLA 9 Format
source_type_guides.description: Complete guide to citing interviews in MLA 9 including personal, published, and broadcast interviews
